title: Sketchbook Folio, "Fortitude and Winged Genius", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: On verso: three studies after monumental funeral, after antique.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Fortitude and Winged Genius", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3515.
